des:
With the Stellar Kit skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Stellar Kit devices by voice. To get started:
* Select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App.
* Follow the instructions in your Stellar Kit app to get your Stellar account linked to your Amazon account.
* Let Alexa get your Stellar Kit devices by saying "Alexa, discover devices".
Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:
* Use the names you previously set up. They are shown in the Stellar Kit app and can be changed.
* Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups).

Notes:
* This skill uses "Login With Amazon" for account linking.
* Groups set in the Stellar Kit app are also added as devices to your Alexa. You can control them by saying "Alexa, turn on kitchen bulbs".
* If Alexa replies "The hub the device [name] connected to is not responding", it means that the Stellar Kit gateway is offline. Please check its network and power supply.
* If you have any questions or suggestions, contact us at service@sansitech.us
